hi kris,
thanks for your prompt reply. I read the heritrix_out.log file. Fr=
om
there i got the idea that my jdk.*.* path is not working. So i made it
c=
orrect and then i tried. Now finally i was able to run my first
crawl. Than=
ks again.

I got one .arc file after a domain level crawl. Now i want to ge=
t all
the objects(pages, for eg. pdf, html, doc. etc..) from that arc, So
t=
hat i can use them for further processing.. How I'll do it??? 
waiting for =
your reply...

Shadab :-)

tinn Sigurdsson"
<kris@a...> wrote:
>
> When you get that (the endless dott=
ing ....) it means that Heritrix
failed
> to start properly. It's usually w=
orth checking the heritrix_out.log
to see
> what happened (if it exists).
>=
  
> You should try downloading the tar file minus the source (i.e. the one=

> without the "src" in the name -
>
<http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/ar=
chive-crawler/heritrix-1.4.0.tar.gz?do
> wnload> heritrix-1.4.0.tar.gz ) an=
d try again with that. The
instructions
> where aimed at those builds and t=
o be honest I've never even looked
at the
> contents of the "src" builds as=
 I check the source out straight from
> SourceForge. If this doesn't work a=
nd the heritrix_out.log doesn't
offer any
> insight, you may have discovere=
d a new bug...
>  
> - Kris
